doc_context:
path /v3/offchain/solana/transfer
opid soltransfer
params None
sum send sol from a virtual account to the blockchain
reqBody
oneof
type object
props
senderaccountid
maxlength 24
minlength 24
desc sender account id
type string
from
desc blockchain account to send from
maxlength 43
minlength 44
type string
address
desc blockchain address to send assets
maxlength 43
minlength 44
type string
amount
desc amount to be sent in sol / usdcsol or custom spl token based on the senderaccountid currency type
maxlength 38
pattern ddd
type string
privatekey
maxlength 128
minlength 87
desc private key for account private key or signature id must be present
type string
fee
desc fee to be charged for the operation for sol fee is decided by the blockchain but default sol fee is 0000005 this fee will be only charged on top of the withdrawal amount to the virtual account
maxlength 38
pattern ddd
type string
compliant
desc compliance check if withdrawal is not compliant it will not be processed
type boolean
paymentid
desc identifier of the payment shown for created transaction within tatum sender account
maxlength 100
minlength 1
type string
sendernote
maxlength 500
minlength 1
desc note visible to owner of withdrawing account
type string
required
from
senderaccountid
address
privatekey
amount

path /v3/offchain/xlm/transfer
opid xlmtransfer
params None
sum send xlm from a virtual account to the blockchain
reqBody
oneof
type object
props
senderaccountid
maxlength 24
minlength 24
desc sender account id
type string
fromaccount
desc blockchain account to send from
maxlength 56
minlength 56
type string
address
desc blockchain address to send assets
maxlength 56
minlength 56
type string
amount
desc amount to be sent in xlm or xlmbased asset
maxlength 38
pattern ddd
type string
secret
maxlength 56
minlength 56
desc secret for account secret or signature id must be present
type string
compliant
desc compliance check if withdrawal is not compliant it will not be processed
type boolean
attr
desc short message to recipient usually used as an account discriminator it can be either 28 characters long ascii text 64 characters long hex string or uint64 number when using as an account disciminator in tatum offchain ledger can be in format of destinationaccsourceacc
pattern 064
type string
maxlength 64
paymentid
desc identifier of the payment shown for created transaction within tatum sender account
maxlength 100
minlength 1
type string
sendernote
maxlength 500
minlength 1
desc note visible to owner of withdrawing account
type string
required

senderaccountid
address
secret
amount
